steps.step: Melt the butter in a medium frying pan over high heat.

Crack the egg into the pan and let it cook until the egg whites begin coagulating, about 1 minute. Sprinkle with salt and pepper. Cover with a lid on for 1 minute to finish cooking the egg. Then, uncover and remove the egg from the pan.

steps_updated.steps_updated: Melt the butter in a medium frying pan over high heat.
Crack the egg into the pan and let it cook until the egg whites begin coagulating, about 1 minute.
Cover with a lid on for 1 minute to finish cooking the egg.
Then, uncover and remove the egg from the pan.
